verbs.description: [ARGM-ADV: Usually] [ARG1: religious leaders] [V: are] [ARG2: divided on political issues] . But from Sessions’ United Methodists to Trump ’s Presbyterians to the Catholic bishops and presidential allies like Franklin Graham , the administration ’s border policies are under attack .

Usually religious leaders are divided on political issues . But [ARGM-ADV: from Sessions’ United Methodists to Trump ’s Presbyterians to the Catholic bishops and presidential allies like Franklin Graham] , [ARG1: the administration ’s border policies] [V: are] [ARG2: under attack] .
